title: Untitled

This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.469.7 of October 23, 2025
New features
During the initial login to applications based on
SaaS and Private Cloud solutions
, the system now prompts users to complete a short survey to determine their professional role, industry, and tasks they solve.
SaaS and Private Cloud solutions
now feature an AI-powered assistant implemented to support and consult users on platform capabilities based on selected knowledge base data.
It is now possible to manage the number of data series in
structural diagrams
of "Column" and "Horizontal Column" types.
It is now possible to format code in the algorithm editor using the
Ctrl
+
Shift
+
F
keyboard shortcut.
The messenger function has been implemented to automate setting user
status
for a specified period of time.
The new isInTreeObjects function now allows checking if an object is part of a hierarchy and retrieving collections of its child or parent objects in filtering algorithms.
The process of configuring an email address for sending messages during user registration in the application is now simpler - accounts can now be created directly from the
login page constructor
.
It is now possible to fully manage access permissions through update packaging, including replacing default permissions and permissions for existing objects.
Flexible configuration for binding IP addresses to user accounts has been added for system access control.
It is now possible to automatically copy text blocks from the source file or template into the generated document.
Changes and improvements
Hotkey support was added for working with ETL and business process schemas.
The display of the employee who made the last changes to a system object was adjusted.
The functionality of hotkeys when opening the chat on the additional panel was improved.
Automatic
main menu
updates were added when creating/editing/deleting menu items.
The object opening through the configured
main menu item
was debugged.
The process of generating instance names for the "Custom registry settings" [SYS_REGISTRY_CUSTOM] type was debugged.
Expressions for instance names were added for the "Permission control settings by condition tree", "Access permission control settings", and "Algorithm execution settings" types.
Instance deletion was stabilized when dependent objects exist.
The ability to ignore optional
object type validations
when saving an object type using
custom actions
was debugged.
Storage of unsaved attribute values was restored when input data validation errors occur during object saving.
The ability to create SQL-based data sources from the
source attribute
configuration modal window was added.
The creation of objects through the child attribute was stabilized.
Excessive buttons were removed from the subject area control panel.
Export of large data volumes from the registry was optimized through the
"Use streaming export" system setting
.
Performance was improved when opening
light registries
.
Tile registry
now supports
batch actions
for click override.
The display of related child objects in the task registry, located on the visual of the parent object, was debugged.
The display of the
system settings
registry was restored.
The placement of
search filters
in the registries was adjusted.
For file type attributes with the
"Image" visual
, the ability to define available file upload methods was added: from disk and/or from the system.
Code display in the algorithm editor placed on a visual using
frames
was debugged.
Custom widget
functionality was stabilized when placed in
side panels
.
Saving the slider position in the attribute with
"Input field with step slider"
was stabilized when saving the object.
Display of the
"Status Bar"
widget was stabilized.
Transfer of the
"Image"
widget via
updates
was debugged.
Display of the
"Financial Statements"
widget on tile registry visuals was fixed.
Switching between tabs and sections on the
"Financial Statements"
widget visual is now synchronized.
Functionality of the
"Calendar Booking"
widget was stabilized.
Processing of the
"Signal Start Event"
stage was stabilized.
Display of the
Gantt chart
during scrolling was debugged.
The ability to change attribute order on task cards was added to the extended version of the
Kanban board
.
Table display with breakdowns was stabilized for the analytical panel of the
"Key Performance Indicators"
dashboard.
Sorting by aggregation fields was debugged for the analytical panel of the
"Table"
dashboard.
Logic for configuring field aggregation and grouping in
object data sources
was stabilized.
The clearing of relations with system objects was debugged when deleting an algorithm code.
Clearing values of multiselect attributes via the
clearMultiSelectValue
function was stabilized.
The ability to set a primitive object as a value for an object attribute using the
attr
function was debugged.
Functionality of the
dictPrimitive
and writeWfLog functions was restored.
The ability to access attributes of objects obtained via the
getObject
or
getObjectByIndex
functions was debugged, using autocomplete and the
attrByVar
function.
The functionality of the
docxToPdf
function was stabilized when converting an Excel document to a PDF file.
The configuration of additional parameters for
actions
with the "Call algorithm" and "Execute ETL by files" user interface modules was restored.
Performance of the
condition tree
was improved when changing node state.
Asynchronous algorithm execution in ETL processes was optimized.
The
"View metadata"
permission is now required to create algorithms.
Application of
permissions for attributes
of the "Child object" type was stabilized.
Transfer of object types via updates was debugged when
keys/indexes
containing object attributes of the parent type exist.
Operation of
audit
normalization schedules was debugged.
The ability to
limit calls to excessive HTTP API methods
was stabilized.
For reporting forms, the row collapsing logic was adjusted: the "Can be collapsed" parameter now controls the collapsing capability, while the "Collapsed" parameter controls the default state.
Operation of the
balance sheet checks
algorithm was stabilized.
Export of reporting forms to Excel was debugged.
The visibility of images in the document generated from the template was debugged.
Performance was improved when generating the document and updating values from the source.
Formatting application to document text was fixed when bookmarks are present.
Data display in the document and questionnaire was restored when updating values from the source.
Comment display in the document was debugged, the ability to export the document file in the current format was restored, and version comparison of the template-generated document was stabilized.
Now, the document generated from the template with bookmarks is created in the corresponding mode.
The display of the document with locks based on the userâ€™s role and permissions was debugged.
The creation of a new document version from a file was stabilized.
The process of managing access permissions to the
electronic document
was debugged.
Microphone usage indication during audio calls was stabilized.
A special "Favorites" chat is now available in the GreenData mobile application for storing important messages, files, and notes.
